job.title: senior data scientist
job.description: strongNow Brewing  Sr Data Scientist tobeapartnerbrbrstrongFrom the beginning Starbucks set out to be a different kind of company One that not only celebrated coffee and the rich tradition but that also brought a feeling of connection We are known for developing extraordinary leaders who share this passion and are guided by their service to othersbrbrAs a Starbucks Sr Data Scientist you will build data products uncover customer insights amp communicate discoveries that drive towards better decisions across the Marketing amp Digital domains and develop a strong partnership with stakeholders to enhance understanding of our customersbrbrstronguLeveraging Your Previous Experience We Will Enable You TobrustrongulliEvaluate amp translate unstructured questions from business teams to data problems and define roadmap for potential data solutionsliliWork independently as well as part of crossfunctional teams to build relevant analytics solutions using quantitative approachesliliDrive adoption of analytics data products amp insights across business teamsliliUtilize systems thinking approach to conceive plan amp build evergreen data productsliliDevelop analytic systems amp predictive models experiment with new data science techniques and visualize data amp craft effective communications to share discoveriesliliEstablish key performance indicators for the business team and promote data driven decision making that allows for effective planning in stakeholder teamsliliEstablish yourself amp the team as subject matter experts in advanced analytics across departmentsliliCollaborate with other data scientists amp business teams across the Marketing amp Digital spaces to drive foundational understanding of the Starbucks digital experiencebrliulstronguWed Love To Hear From People WithbrustrongulliDemonstrated experience with data munging analysis machine learning techniques amp visualizationliliStrong problem solving skills with ability to influence business teams at different levelsliliWorking knowledge of data systems design amp data technologiesliliKnowledge of statistical methods amp scripting SQL Python or RliliRetail customer loyalty andor eCommerce experiencebrliulJoin us and be part of something bigger Apply todaybrbrememStarbucks and its brands are an equal opportunity employer of all qualified individualsbrbrWe are committed to creating a diverse and welcoming workplace that includes partners with diverse backgrounds and experiences We believe that enables us to better meet our mission and values while serving customers throughout our global communities People of color women LGBTQIA veterans and persons with disabilities are encouraged to applybrbrQualified applicants with criminal histories will be considered for employment in a manner consistent with all federal state and local ordinances Starbucks Corporation is committed to offering reasonable accommodations to job applicants with disabilities If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability please contact us at 2063180660 or via email at applicantaccommodationstarbuckscombrbremem
